titleStmt.title: The Juniper lecturer corrected and his Latin, pagan, putid [sic] nonsence paraphrazed ; also, The coffee scoffer cussed and kicked, or, The pittifull paedagoog's Latin vindication

notesStmt.note: "The coffee scoffer cussed and kicked, or, The pittiful paedagoog's Latin vindication" : p. 11-16.
In Latin verse, with introductory fable in English verse.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
